answers.answer: Why to early ? What were the reasons

Im due december 30th have 2 boys both born prematurly as well due 2 first havin preeclampsia born by emergency c-section and second due 2 small baby born by c-section i am hopin that wiv this 1 i can go full term and try a natural birth
If all goes well ill be due the 30th too with my first sooo excited !!

I'm due December 23 and not thrilled about it. I have 2 daughters so we're hoping for a boy. My oldest was born in early December, I'd hate to have 2 birthdays and Christmas! Plus, I'd be in the hospital for Christmas. Boo.

Due dec 20th with our 4th! We hv 3 boys so hoping for a girl since its our last time! I went 20 days early with both my oldest & youngest (middle son is my stepson) so hoping to go nov 30th lol then we'll hv 2 nov babies & 2 feb babies (& hubby & I are both may babies haha)
Im not excited about having a baby around Christmas at all but praying I make it full term praying everyone makes it to 9 months safely
I had them early due to having a weak cervix I was dilated 3 cm at 5 months and didn't stay on bed rest as the doctor advised me so I had them early
Yeah my due date is around christmas. And I told my husband our poor child will already hate us lol.
I'm due Dec 30th with my second!
I am due 27 dec with my 1st! And my bday is 31 dec so super nervous!! Going it alone but amazing family and friend support :)

question: I'm due December 26th I have 2 boys already hoping for a baby girl this time but I will be happy either way, period was due April 21st I took a test at the doctor on the 24th and bam a big fat positive I'm praying I make it to 9 months due to my weak cervix both of my kids were born prematurely my oldest at 30 weeks and my youngest at 33 weeks...
title: Anyone Due December 25-30th 2014?
